title: Maxar Technologies awarded $44 million contract renewal by U.S. National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency
summary: Maxar Technologies has been awarded a $44 million contract renewal by the U.S. National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency (NGA) for the Global Enhanced GEOINT Delivery (G-EGD) program. The contract involves providing high-resolution commercial imagery and integrating SAR data from providers like Capella Space and ICEYE into the G-EGD platform.
why_it_matters: The contract renewal underscores Maxar's role in supporting U.S. government missions with geospatial intelligence, including the integration of commercial SAR data providers. However, ICEYE is mentioned only as a data provider, not as a direct participant in a deal.
